entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Lloydminster
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:53 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, -8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lloydminster Airport 04:45 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: -8.0°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: NNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.
